p: Newborns, premature infants, and those with chronic lung disease are at greater risk of developing severe disease by infection with HRSV [ 48]. Despite their importance, there is no vaccine prophylaxis against HRSV infection or effective antiviral therapy available. Currently, in Latin America, only palivizumab (Pz) (Synagis; MedImmune, Gaithersburg, MD, USA) is being used in the prophylaxis and therapy of these infections [ 68].
